name: Nidoran ♂

evolution.description: Nidoran ♂ can evolve into Nidorino at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 5 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Poison Pin Pokémon. Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll a 1d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of poison damage equal to this Pokémon’s proficiency modifier.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage when attacking a Pokémon of the same type.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.
